item.title: Task List - Ionic based PWA
item.description: Turning the Task List application was not hard at all! If you’re interested, or need some guidance about how to do so, be sure to checkout the Ionic documentation. After building the PWA code base, I had to modify the <base href /> in the index.html file. I also had to modify paths in the manifest.webmanifest file to work with my website.
